Subject: Psycho Theatrical Trailer (1960)
Object: Psycho’s trailer where Hitchcock shows the audience the movie’s set like he was a tour guide.

Subject: Psycho Theatrical Trailer (1960)
Object: Marketing of the movie; Hitchcock as a guide in a crime scene setup culminating in Janet Leigh’s scream; Trailer’s instruction: «The picture you must see from the beginning… Or not at all!...»
